## Cluster analysis

#### **Step 1: Cluster**
_Ejecutar el analisis de conglomerados_
```{r}
# Ward Hierarchical Clustering
d <- dist(spe.fish, method = "euclidean") # distance matrix
fit <- hclust(d, method="ward.D2")
plot(fit, cex = 0.6, hang = -1) # display dendogram
```
